name: Dreihander
description:
Take control of a powerful tri-mode vessel as you take on waves of unique enemies in this intense arcade-style shooter. Every 10 seconds, the ship changes modes: dodge enemy fire, lay down devastating firepower, and then repair and buff your subsystems.

Play with audio on! Gamepad supported! Fullscreen is best!

WASD to move. Hold left mouse button for auto-fire, and to heal/buff systems while in the repair phase. Damage to systems causes the related game function to get worse. Too much damage to a single system destroys your ship.
